title: 1 April Gamemode?
body:
well i woke up happy as all hell for nothing, hoping for a Gamemode (urf, one for all, ect) today, but none just fu##ing skins so they can make more money
so disipointed :(

what do you think?

replies.body: I agree 100%. Riot is so dissapointing... So many people stayed up late waiting for Riot's new and creative way to celebrate April Fool's only to find this piece of crap Draven garbage. Sure it's funny, the whole "April Fool's" gig, but I'm sure that a large portion of the league community plays to see what Riot can do to keep the game more engaging and quite frankly, this is honestly seems like disrespect to their players.

They aren't disrespecting players if they are working on something that the community has been asking for a long time ago, which is the Rotating queue. Sure URF has been asked for quite a lot, and left a superb impression on it's first release, but now they are creating something that has been requested WAAAY more than URF. That is far from disrespecting players.

> [{quoted}](name=Ligerzz,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yEGANhAf,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-01T12:49:10.436+0000)
>
> They aren't disrespecting players if they are working on something that the community has been asking for a long time ago, which is the Rotating queue. Sure URF has been asked for quite a lot, and left a superb impression on it's first release, but now they are creating something that has been requested WAAAY more than URF. That is far from disrespecting players.

But... URF is already built. You don't plan software development at the mast second. They have a timeline that goes months or even a year out. Thats why this Draven stuff seems fishy... they WOULD make more money with URF. Not this buggy Draven stuff...from a business perspective it would have been less work to do URF. Which is why I'm guessing/hoping this afternoon they will unlock URF.

more people playing doesnt equate to making more money though. Sure lots of people would be playing urf, but would we be buying the skins? or would we just be playing our favorite champions in the game mode?

anywho, I think that urf will be here this year, they have urf kench and earlier in the year they speculated about how the new champions would be in urf.

It's already confirmed to be this year with the rotating queues. But hey people want their URF fix now and then complain AGAIN in August when it wouldn't come back. It's either in April or it's in the rotating queue and people can't think long term enough to see that rotating queue is the better decision since both is not an option (if it were both then the April 1st one loses ALL significance since it would be back next month).
Is there any actual reason that there cant be both? they already have the game mode made. There isnt really an excuse to not just put the game mode onto live for a few days...

That would delay the initial time for them to put the rotating game-modes out as they'd have to then re-calculate the amount of days that would properly be allotted to the other game-modes. Each game-mode in this rotation will be available at least twice throughout this year, and they are choosing to release it today as it properly gives all other modes a chance to be played twice this year. This would also mean they would have to either:

Make URF (Ultra Rapid Fire) appear a total of three times this year whereas other game-modes would only have two chances at being played this year.

or...

Bring Urf out now, and include that as the first, releasing it once more later in the year as the second time for it to come back.

Orr...

If they did their numbers right, shorten the amount of time game-modes will be out to allow each game mode to make an appearance for a total of three times throughout the year.

Personally I'm fine with being patient. We will be getting our game-mode, and then some more game modes throughout the year rotating. I'm fine with that, and I hope you are as well. we may be the costumers, but with them trying to give us something better than just one urf mode for the year (thee end.)
We should be grateful they are even doing anything to begin with, and giving thanks.

EDIT: I'm only pointing out the possible issues that could be preventing them from doing so as well as seeing possible solutions to how this could be done in my third thought on the issue of them not putting out a game-mode in the mean time.

no no no, although my first few sentences sounded as if I was quite definitive on why it could not happen, I'm only presuming it would cause problems for the time-frames in which other game-modes are sitting in rotation based off the information I made sure to follow up with after said sentences.

 If URF Mode was put out, what would that mean for the other game modes given they have a set amount of days they will be out?

This is pretty much what I mean with thee smallest amount of detail I can possibly give. I then present possible issues that could rise from putting URF out with my third plausible issue holding a possible solution. That is all. I'm not attempting to defend Riot. Hell there could be no issues with putting URF out right now, but I'm only touching on the possible reasons it isn't out since it. . . . well, isn't out.

In a sense, I'm presenting possible issues, questioning them, and seeing if they could be fixed. If there are no issues, then I've no Idea why Riot hasn't released URF. They said they wouldn't release it today, but if we dismiss there being any possible problems as to why they chose not to bring it back, then I don't know why they made that decision. That is all.

Lastly, http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/vjax6fIE-announcing-the-rotating-game-mode-queue
Click: "Read more"
around the end of the third paragraph. 

They are doing what they can for this new game-mode, and I'm glad they put all of them into one big rotation. That I am happy about. I'm still not feeling too good about previous decisions made by Riot, but I can say this was a good move, and I've no prob waiting.

They're working on the Rotating Game Mode guys, you'll have your URF and more than once a year. Let them get it working. They even said (quite awhile back) that URF won't be returning this April Fools.
Twice a year for less than a third of the total time it was up last year.

Ok, Each gamemode will be available for 3 days, the weekend, starting on Friday and ending on Sunday. Riot said that the time could also be extended so we may just have Urf for 7 days when it is available and another 7 days when it comes again. With simple math we see that that comes to 14 days total, the same as last years duration of Urf. Only difference is that it's not here on April 1st and people are crying about it even though Riot said it wouldn't be here.

The only thing we've been loosely promised is 2-4 days of URF (if you can play those days) twice, so 4-8 days at very specific times. That's not the same. Don't assume they're going to extend it a full week each time.
